name: JBT Corporation
description: JBT Corporation is a leading global technology solutions provider that specializes in food processing and air transportation. Founded in 1884, JBT has evolved significantly over the years, establishing itself as a trusted partner for food manufacturers and airport operators alike. The company operates through two primary segments: FoodTech and AeroTech. JBT FoodTech provides innovative solutions for food processing, including equipment and systems for meat, poultry, seafood, and other food products. The company's technologies are designed to enhance productivity, improve food safety, and reduce operational costs. In the AeroTech segment, JBT delivers airport ground support equipment, including de-icing systems, baggage handling, and cargo loaders, ensuring the safe and efficient operation of airport logistics. With a strong commitment to sustainability, JBT integrates eco-friendly practices into its operations, helping clients reduce their environmental impact. The company’s global footprint allows it to serve customers in over 100 countries, delivering quality service and support. JBT Corporation continues to innovate and adapt to changing market demands, focusing on developing advanced technologies that meet the needs of its diverse clientele across the food and airline industries.
